Array: * The History of the Kingdom\n  by Gerson Boom
* "After his declaration of war\n  on the humans, the queen\n  tried to overthrow the king."
* "This was the only time the\n  Royal Guard was given a direct\n  order of violence by the king."
* "The queen was banished to the\n  Ruins,^05 to the anguish of his\n  majesty."
* "With such a violent end to\n  their children,^05 and the queen's\n  coup attempt..."
* "The kingdom fell into a\n  deep depression."
* "One that persists to this\n  very day."
* "King Asgore continues to try\n  his best to bring hope back\n  to the people."
* "But with how things have been\n  for the good part of a century\n  or so,^05 who's to say it will?"
